Pay it forward instead of being a petty piece of shit. I can't imagine if Marc had cancer instead of Gregg. U would've needed everyone's undivided attention. You have Brooklyn & u had her close to 50. Is that not enough to make u happy???

@NeNeLeakes Thank u so much for reminding everyone that cancer doesn't just stop bc of the Pandemic. My step dad is fighting cancer right now & he & my mom r at the Cleveland Clinic everyday amongst this Covid outbreak. They r fighting a double fight. Thanks again üíú

@MichaelRapaport Fucking selfish idiots. I am sooo over ppl like this. I'm trying to keep my son with asthma alive, my husband with diabetes alive, my step dad with cancer alive, & my 70 yr old mother alive. I have a lot of anger, but I really believe they will get their's.

@mama_senior Being a breast cancer survivor, I know ur very strong!My mom beat it twice, once in '01 & she got it again in '12. We live in the South & my parents live in Ohio. My step dad is going through chemo right now at the Cleveland Clinic.I'm petrified that we may never see them againü•∫

@mrjaxtaylor Thank https://t.co/aR4NBhm1BH step dad just got diagnosed with lung cancer 3 weeks ago & is starting chemo.They live 16 hrs away & bc of my husband's diabetes,we can't travel there.I'm devastated that my son may not b able to see him b4 he dies. He's 14 & has already lost my dad.

@DannyDeraney I'm really wanting to watch the Tiger King thing on Netflix, but I'm sleeping a lot. Got a positive test result from the COVID-19 test the day b4 yesterday. Had started running fever on the 15th. Figured it was sinus infection, but I'm quarantined & it just actually hit me today.

@PavlosTouliatos @PaulGavigan4 @washingtonpost Oh wow. Just had to Google that. Yup, it's ppl like him that's getting so many sick. We had already quarantined for a little over a week by I tested positive. It's people like him that gets people killed.

@matthaig1 Any words of advice that u can extend to me that tested positive on the 23rd? Has asked u earlier, but I didn't respond, but the vibe I've gotten from u is that you want to help ppl. Having a hard time being away from my husband & son.

@MattieLBreaux Haven't been able to sleep til the sun comes up. Tested positive for Covid on the 23rd...maybe I'm afraid to die during the night, but it's irrational. I have a mild case. Plus my husband can't sleep with me & I miss my son. Sleeping in the day has just been easier all around...

@matthaig1 I hear you.Your not ramping up my anxiety. It's been crazy.I tested positive for Covid on the 23rd.I actually called California Psychics just to have someone to talk to since it's the middle of the night.Miss my husband & son so much. Any words of wisdom you give me?

@Rosie I need somebody to relate to. I feel so alone. Got sent home. Was told to stay in my bedroom & make sure no one uses my bathroom. Also have to self distance myself from my 2 dogs & my cat bc it's possible I could infect them. Tested positive on the 13th. I'm really feeling alone.

@ShirazMaher I tested positive Mon. I was sick for 8 days b4 I got tested, but my symptoms were very much the same.I woke up with 102 fever. Only lasted a day.I think bc of sinus drainage, my cough wasn't quite as dry, tho constant. My chest is still very tight.Hope u continue to get better.

@stassi That sucks. Can't even imagine having one over seas! We eloped 14 yrs ago June. If it makes u feel any better, I tested positive for Corona on Mon. It's fun. Definitely recommend. Lol. Just teasing u. I'm thru the worst of it. U will have a great wedding bc ur u & Beau is Beau.üíú

@nypost Bless his heart. I know where he's coming from. I had the same symptoms & a few others & tested positive the day before yesterday. I'm staying in my master bath & bed rm. I have 1 son, Aidan, 14 & my husband I'm trying to not infect. Also got instructions to not touch my pets.

@KimKardashian R u ever going to realize ur too old for this b.s.?I've tested positive. We immediately volunteered for the nursing homes here in Louisiana&made sure food banks stayed open.I have a 14 yr old. U could b doing so much. Have watched ur show a lot.Ain't nobody now tho. Dumb bitch.
